alert.note: Alert for Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 16 at 3:18AM HST until February 16 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large west-northwest swell will continue to generate large breaking waves along most north and west facing shores of the island chain today. This swell will begin to gradually lower tonight, but surf will likely remain within the High Surf Advisory criteria along shorelines exposed to this swell through early Thursday morning. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf will be 16 to 22 feet along north facing shores of Molokai and Maui, and 14 to 18 feet along west facing shores of Molokai. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials, and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala
